title: GST on UPI transactions above Rs 2,000: Government issues clarification
summary: The Times of India's Tech Desk reports on government clarification regarding GST on UPI transactions exceeding Rs 2,000. The dedicated tech journalism team covers various aspects of technology news including gadgets, trends, and digital platforms.
content:
The TOI Tech Desk is a dedicated team of journalists committed to delivering the latest and most relevant news from the world of technology to readers of The Times of India. Their news coverage spans a wide spectrum across gadget launches, gadget reviews, trends, in-depth analysis, exclusive reports and breaking stories that impact technology and the digital universe. The team focuses on topics ranging from how-to guides to the latest developments in AI, cybersecurity, personal gadgets, and major platforms like WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook, delivering news with accuracy and authenticity.

The article discusses government clarification regarding GST implementation on UPI transactions above Rs 2,000, though specific details of the clarification are not provided in the excerpt.

markdown_content:
## About TOI Tech Desk
The TOI Tech Desk is a dedicated team of journalists committed to delivering the latest and most relevant news from the world of technology to readers of The Times of India. Their news coverage spans a wide spectrum across gadget launches, gadget reviews, trends, in-depth analysis, exclusive reports and breaking stories that impact technology and the digital universe.

The team focuses on topics ranging from:
* How-to guides
* Latest developments in AI
* Cybersecurity
* Personal gadgets
* Major platforms like WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook

delivering news with accuracy and authenticity.

## GST Implementation Update
The article discusses government clarification regarding GST implementation on UPI transactions above Rs 2,000, though specific details of the clarification are not provided in the excerpt.
